summary: Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience specializing in web development, software design, and deployment. Proven success in leading large-scale projects, including: Developed an admissions system at Freshworks Academy, supporting over 3500 candidates. Designed a global volunteer management portal for Freshworks, utilized by 5000+ employees. Built educational tools that reduced student evaluation time by 95%. Currently pursuing an Executive Post Graduate Program (EPGP) in Machine Learning & AI at IIIT Bangalore, expanding my expertise in advanced AI applications. Eager to leverage technical and AI knowledge to drive innovation and project success in a dynamic tech environment.

bulletPoints: Led the development of the FSSA Admissions system, supporting 3500+ candidates with test-taking, CRM, and automation features.
Designed and built the Global Giving Portal for volunteer management, engaging 5000+ employees in CSR initiatives.
Developed educational tools (visualizers, automation scripts), reducing student code evaluation time by 95%.
Managed and deployed projects on AWS and E2E Networks, ensuring scalability and high availability.
Configured CI/CD pipelines to optimize operational efficiency for student project development.
Conducted technical training for 120+ students in web development, Ruby, Java, and MySQL.
Optimized data structures as part of the database architecture team, improving information flow efficiency.
Integrated RESTful APIs and enhanced front-end features, resulting in better user interaction and experience.

projects.name: Global Giving Portal
projects.description: Designed and implemented an employee volunteer management tool for 5000+ Freshworks employees
projects.impact: Facilitated seamless volunteer management and increased engagement in corporate social responsibility initiatives.

projects.name: AI-Driven Extraction/Reader
projects.description: Doc-Con - AI Data Extraction/Reader: a Python application incorporating OpenAI, LangChain, and Pinecone to implement RAG agents, allowing users to upload documents and interactively query for detailed insights, making it a powerful tool for extracting and analyzing information from large datasets.

education.degree: Executive Post Graduate Program (EPGP), Machine Learning & AI

education.institution: C. Kandhaswami Naidu College for Men
